label: uncl3285
comment: Code specifying the party to receive an instruction.

values.label: Applicant's bank
values.comment: The financial institution which is requested to issue the documentary credit.

values.label: Issuing bank
values.comment: The financial institution which issues the documentary credit, if the applicant's bank is not acting as the issuing bank.

values.label: Beneficiary's bank
values.comment: The financial institution with which the beneficiary maintain an account.

values.label: Beneficiary
values.comment: The party in whose favour the documentary credit is to be issued and the party who must comply with the credit's terms and conditions.

values.label: Creditor
values.comment: Party to whom payment is due.

values.label: Receiving bank
values.comment: Identifies the bank which is to receive funds.

values.label: Creditor's bank
values.comment: Identifies the bank to whom payment is due.

values.label: Instruction receiving party identifier
values.comment: Code specifying the party to receive an instruction.

values.label: Debtor
values.comment: Party from whom payment is due.

values.label: Payer or payer's agent
values.comment: Party or party's agent from whom funds will be made available.
